title: Gated Community & Modern Living Mins From UNLV Medical District!
map_address: 1721 Crystal Ann Ave near Shadow Lane
posting_body: ['Welcome to Habitat @', 'DTLV!', 'This unique community of 3-story homes is conveniently located in the heart of Las Vegas, just minutes away from Downtown Las Vegas restaurants, bars, and several performing art venues.', 'Habitat @', 'DTLV is ideal for both personal and professional lifestyles, offering spacious two and three-bedroom homes, with two-car garages and private yards.', 'Welcome home!', 'Community Amenities', '•\tOn-Site Management', '•\tOn-Site Maintenance', '•\tCourtyard', '•\tControlled Access/Gated', '•\tBBQ/Picnic Area', '•\tGarage', 'Floor Plan Amenities', '•\tQuartz Countertops With Subway Tile Backsplash', '•\tWasher & Dryer', '•\tCustom Fixtures', '•\tFull-Size Stainless-Steel Appliances', '•\tDesigner Upgraded Wall Color', '•\tCustom Banister/Railings', '•\tFaux Wood Flooring', '•\tNest Thermostat', '•\tKeyless Front Door Entry', '•\tGarage', 'Address: 1721 Crystal Ann Avenue', 'Las Vegas, Nevada 89106', 'Office Hours: Monday – Friday 9AM – 5PM', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Web: <URL>/', 'Professionally managed by Signature Management', '•\tPets - Max 3 allowed Comments: Pet Friendly!', 'Pet Fee: $300.00 (Non-Refundable), Additional Pet(s): $150.00 each (Non-Refundable), Monthly Pet Rent: $30.00 per pet (Limit 3).', 'Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Call for Details!', 'Restrictions: Pit Bull, Staffordshire Terrier, Rottweiler, Doberman Pinscher, Chow, Malamute, Akita, Wolf-Hybrids, and any mix containing any of these breeds.']
